name: Mario Kart Wii Archive
summary: Learn about .U8 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: U8 files are saved in the U8 archive format and are compressed with the Yaz0 compression method. Besides U8 files, the U8 format is typically stored as .SZS files.

description: A U8 file is an archive format used by Mario Kart Wii, a Mario themed kart racing game. It stores game data files, such as a .TPL Wii image file or .BRLYT Wii textures and material lists file. U8 files are often modified by the homebrew and modding communities to create custom Mario Kart graphics.
